column5: Set ROUNDING_VALUE to 64 to match Samsung's stride requirements.

Fix regression after https://github.com/Dimezis/BlurView/pull/91.
Don't blur BlurView's children, but still support programmatic screenshots.
Also, BlurViews can now blur each other.

Merge pull request #95 from Dimezis/v1.6.1

Fix rendering issue on API 21 emulator.

Fix rendering issue on API 21 emulator.
Fix potential NPE when trying to update blur before the layout happened.
Fix index var name (lol), publish sources and javadoc
Add build step to CI config
Handle tags without hashes in the end

Merge pull request #92 from Dimezis/v1.6.0

V1.6.0
Bintray release setup. Bump gradle plugin
Replace deprecated leftshift, remove redundant gradle settings

Fix bug preventing blur algorithms with (canModifyBitmap() == false) to work.

Set the new returned bitmap to a canvas. Clarify in javadoc how to properly implement such algorithms.

Extract BlurViewFacade and return it in setupWith to prevent user from accidentally calling it as not the first method in the setup chain.

Move leftovers of logic in BlurView to BlurController.

Clean up javadoc and comments.
Set paint's filter flag in constructor

New approach to coordinates calculation.
Now working in screen coordinate system to handle multiple windows properly (Dialogs, for example).

New approach to blur updating.
Not invalidating a BlurView now, but just updating a bitmap and relying on Android's HW accelerated drawing behavior of rendering a bitmap recorded before.
Get rid of isMeDrawing now and related crap

Merge pull request #91 from masc3d/draw

FIXED draw won't render when not accelerated (eg programmatic screensâ€¦
FIXED draw won't render when not accelerated (eg programmatic screenshots)

Refactoring, breaking API naming changes. Better naming and description for old windowBackground() method.
Add Support of transparent backgrounds in blurred Views.
Minor formatting changes, add more nullability annotations
Disable blur when BlurView has 0 height or width

Merge pull request #64 from jlmcdonnell/patch-2

Update manifest to remove unnecessary attributes

Update manifest to remove unnecessary attributes

Remove android:allowBackup="true"
Remove android:supportsRtl="true"
These attributes are unnecessary in a library and will potentially cause builds to fail
Target latest BlurView in SupportRenderscriptBlur module
Add hasFixedTransformationMatrix API, handle dialog location in window properly
Remove redundant ControllerSettings and return BlurView in setter methods

Merge pull request #57 from searchy2/master

Build Tools and Dependency Update v27.0.2

Build Tools and Dependency Update v27.0.2

*Update Build Tools and Dependencies to v27.0.2.
*Update Gradle to v3.0.1. 
*Update .gitignore to exclude .idea files.
Fix crash for case when BlurView is not a child of the rootView (issue 43)
Use no-op BlurAlgorithm impl by default, get rid of Support RenderScript dependency
Create separate BlurAlgorithm implementation using Support RenderScript
Add ids to for scrollview layout  to save instance state
Make some fields package-protected to avoid accessor method creation
Create single method for blur auto update switching, clean up in update logic, post setting of auto update flag to properly override right after view creation
New images due to copyright problems

Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/development' into development

# Conflicts:
#	app/build.gradle
#	library/build.gradle
Update example project, add root layout
Update example project, add blur radius seek bar
Call drawEnd in dispatchDraw, prevent multiple BlurViews to trigger each others blur
Update example to cast root to ViewGroup, reformat

Calculate BlurView position relative to rootView, not to direct parent
Clean up Javadoc a bit.
Update gradle, libs, version numbers, remove apt plugin
Fix Stack overflow in drawUnderlyingViews: add requirement to use hardware accelerated window. Renaming and refactoring
Remove StackBlur due to its performance and critical bug in implementation
Move release script to local gradle config, fix annotations library javadoc
Update version code, libs and sdk version
Update gradle, refactor Page enum a bit
Fix issue 17, correct positioning of blurred content

Add possibility to resume blur auto update.
Remove destroy call when detaching BlurView.
Add not-null check in destroy method for bitmap
Fix NPE in destroy method, in case if outAllocation wasn't initialized yet
Remove support library, using annotations only instead

[Memory] cache huge array to avoid allocation on each blur.

Basically,  the pix array has the same memory foot print as the
original bitmap. If the size don't change, the temp array can be
re use in order to reduce drastically the allocation during
a scroll for instance.

[Memory] divide stack blur allocation by 3.

Avoid using 3 different temp array of [w x h] for R G and B channels
when a single one can be used.
[Memory] divide by 2 the memory foot print when RGB_565 is supported.
Remove redundant bitmap, rounding size to mod 16, refactoring.
Change overlayColor attribute name. Remove malformed comments,
Add bottom space for images in 1st tab
Refactoring. Hid DefaultBlurController, changed interface in view and controller
Now BlurAlgorithm can have float radius
Throwing Illegal argument exception in case of invalid scale factor
Throwing exception in case of invalid scale factor
Changed default scale factor to 8 to meet the allocation stride requirement
Listener visibility changed to protected modifier

Notifying about size change, honoring view animation.
Fixed  zero-size related bugs.
Changed default blur algorithm and radius
Changed default blur algorithm and radius
Now ceiling bitmap's height and width to save precision
Example project updated (using TabLayout, ViewPager and Fragments with RecyclerView)
set willNotDraw(false) to draw without background set
Use deprecated method to remove listener for API < 16
Divided into lib and example project
Refactoring. Removed Builder, now using setters for easier inheritance possibility. Comments added.
Refactored to have more scalable code
Now drawing only BlurView's underlying part of View hierarchy
Now using onPreDrawListener to detect draw() calls

Removed RenderScript blur option.
Clean up.
Passing window background to draw it on canvas
Now using R.id.content as root view
Added color overlay, fixed bug with blurring BlurView's content
Downscaling bitmap. Redraw on scroll changed
Blurring only at layout moment now
